title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: E get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. The matter no be small ooo as Dem suffer them , even threating to kill them for bush for their. Community people rally round to gather money pay this kidnapper to release them. Make I no cap too much, the major thing wey make me yarn this matter be say, this people wey Dem catch no even tell their relative say them dey go somewhere. Thank God say people see Dem as Dem dey go. Na that one make people raise alarm say, where this guy's. 3 guys enter one bike why the other one enter inh own separate bike because their mission different but these same direction. Na dis same spot Dem for catch them. Lesson¬† Always inform your piple about your movement if you trust them or find person wey you fit tell like wife or parent or pikin if u no trust any friend.¬†Always pass busy road, bush road wey be shotcut naim keep people for inside bush for seven days with beaten wey wrestlers self no collect for their life. Dey vigilant and make u no who be your friend This advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.¬†Wisdom Dem say, e dey profitable to direct person.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: I know say this thing dey very important but e no dey easy to do.¬† E dey hard to tell your people every of your waka o. As a young bobo, once once you must involve in illegal movements,¬† how u wan take tell your people say you wan enter Casablanca?Even as person wey don marry, you gat chill out sometimes make family stress no kill you.... base on that, how e go be to tell wifey say you dey enter some kind illegal place? Abi you wan scatter your family? Wetin I go advise be say, person suppose get one trusted person wey you go dey relate your illigal movements to wey no go cast you o. Then wifey and family members fit know the normal movements them. Na sense them take dey survive for this life,¬† meanwhile, my comment na for the guy men them... no be for our Deeper Life members o

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: Clearly at OP, ur family and trustees no fit save guard u where dem supposed harm u just by telling them ur whereabouts. Just as ur storyline, if the guys has told their parents (trustees) about their where to or whereabouts and they kidnapers hit them, how the family (trustees) want take give save guard response to that scenes?Taking the busy roads self no dey too encouraging afterall them say the road to success dey narrow while the rd to poverty dey very broad just as the road to heaven is narrow and rd to hell is broad as may say The truth be say... Tell family and or trustees ur whereto or ur whereabouts Incase of necessity references As for safety, u owe urself that one by being mindful of where u goes and who u associates with.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: Quote from: EluguHcman on September 24, 2023, 10:15:47 AMClearly at OP, ur family and trustees no fit save guard u where dem supposed harm u just by telling them ur whereabouts. Just as ur storyline, if the guys has told their parents (trustees) about their where to or whereabouts and they kidnapers hit them, how the family (trustees) want take give save guard response to that scenes?Taking the busy roads self no dey too encouraging afterall them say the road to success dey narrow while the rd to poverty dey very broad just as the road to heaven is narrow and rd to hell is broad as may say The truth be say... Tell family and or trustees ur whereto or ur whereabouts Incase of necessity references As for safety, u owe urself that one by being mindful of where u goes and who u associates with.My broda, make I make am clear say, na in d morning den kidnapped Dem for road, at least if Dem let their people know, Dem go even get for mind say why dis person never come. Before people realize say this people no dey around na towards night, na then dey start to dey trace them until dey see their bike for road side. We know say family no fit secure person but e fit make person quick dey inform about some issues.

comments.author: Smartgoat
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 10:41:03 AMQuote from: EluguHcman on September 24, 2023, 10:15:47 AMClearly at OP, ur family and trustees no fit save guard u where dem supposed harm u just by telling them ur whereabouts. Just as ur storyline, if the guys has told their parents (trustees) about their where to or whereabouts and they kidnapers hit them, how the family (trustees) want take give save guard response to that scenes?Taking the busy roads self no dey too encouraging afterall them say the road to success dey narrow while the rd to poverty dey very broad just as the road to heaven is narrow and rd to hell is broad as may say The truth be say... Tell family and or trustees ur whereto or ur whereabouts Incase of necessity references As for safety, u owe urself that one by being mindful of where u goes and who u associates with.My broda, make I make am clear say, na in d morning den kidnapped Dem for road, at least if Dem let their people know, Dem go even get for mind say why dis person never come. Before people realize say this people no dey around na towards night, na then dey start to dey trace them until dey see their bike for road side. We know say family no fit secure person but e fit make person quick dey inform about some issues.  my people is good make you tell any of your person your way about. because of bad thing fit happen for road. not only kidnapers alone, car accident fit too happen. e get one of my village person weh this can thing happen. but his own was motor accident. he die there, they only recognize him with his cloth. because he didn't tell anybody his way about. so it's good you get one person you dey tell your way about.

comments.author: Cryptomultiplier
comments.body: Very necessary, that's why I scorn at people who have a second nature of lying at any point in time because the day you would expect people to really believe you, they would think you are lying indeed.Informing the relatives is not restricted to only relatives. Neighbors who have become close can be informed too as well as a colleague or friend of whom can properly identify you.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Omor, you talk well Sha, but e no dey easy bro, you fit tell your people your way about for complete 1 month but you no go fit continue to tell them for complete 3 to 4 months because e no dey easy to do so.You no say sometimes, if you won comot and people no dey your house, who you go tell? Abi you go write letter keep? No nah, the thing he say your mind no go tell you whather you won enter problem or not, but on a second thought, if you get cellphone you fit make call either you call any of your love ones or somebody close, but that one self nah another tin way we no go fit keep, sometimes we fit no get recharge card to use make call.As long as say we they leave for environment way other people self dey, anyhow we Waka eyes must see us even though say them no know were we they waka go, as long as them see the direction way we enter if something happen people way observe go raise alarm.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: OP this topic make sense o but make I tell you the truth, no be everybody wey like to dey tell person where dem dey go o. Some people own be say na don't tell anybody.¬† Anywhere dem dey go no concern you. If you like ask dem no expect dem to answer you and If dem reply you forget wetin dem talk because no be the place dem tell you dem dey go so.¬† Truth be told, e good make person get one Padi wey him dey get good rapport with so as to keep track of am if alarm blow.¬† As a guy man too even if you no fit alert anybody to know about your Parol make sure say your Padi know what's up and too make your family too¬† know that Padi so that them go call am if e happen say nobody knows your whereabouts.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AME get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. The matter no be small ooo as Dem suffer them , even threating to kill them for bush for their. Community people rally round to gather money pay this kidnapper to release them. Make I no cap too much,Kidnapping still dey happen very well for this country, make we no dey mind media say dem no dey report am again but it's still a big issue and the rich no be their only target again as anybody now na target and the kind money this kidnappers dey call to release their victim you go begin think say money full this country like dat. Just few weeks ago dem kidnapped one journalist for my state and na so so millions dem dey call, e come belike journalism dem get money. Some of this kidnappers no ever need the money but are after the body parts of humans because dem dun dey cost for market now and some evil man (both politicians and business Man are using it for money ritual), we just need dey careful on how we dey walka and atleast make our people dey know where we dey go.QuoteThis advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.Keep your Bitcoin investment secret make nobody know how much wey you dey invest, dem fit know say you dey invest in Bitcoin or other cryptocurency but make dem no know how much you dey invest inside because most of the kidnappings wey dey happen na inside information due to envy from your friends as you dey do better than dem and dem go come set you up. Whenever you dey go anywhere try make one trusted person know where you dey go so if something happen and dem wan look for you dem go get idea where to start from. This life na God dey protect so make we dey seek God protection as we dey commot because na only him fit guide your going out and coming back

comments.author: RockBell
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AME get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. The matter no be small ooo as Dem suffer them , even threating to kill them for bush for their. Community people rally round to gather money pay this kidnapper to release them. Make I no cap too much, the major thing wey make me yarn this matter be say, this people wey Dem catch no even tell their relative say them dey go somewhere. Thank God say people see Dem as Dem dey go. Na that one make people raise alarm say, where this guy's. 3 guys enter one bike why the other one enter inh own separate bike because their mission different but these same direction. Na dis same spot Dem for catch them. Lesson¬† Always inform your piple about your movement if you trust them or find person wey you fit tell like wife or parent or pikin if u no trust any friend.¬†Always pass busy road, bush road wey be shotcut naim keep people for inside bush for seven days with beaten wey wrestlers self no collect for their life. Dey vigilant and make u no who be your friend This advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.¬†Wisdom Dem say, e dey profitable to direct person.Especially girls and everyone is feeling too big to say they are going out but the country is not even that safe, taking serious security measures is the best thing to do, and the issue of kidnapping has even reduced I remember days when they were operating seriously, especially in that Kaduna road and were requesting for a large amount of money from the families of victims and if they don't comply they end up killing them. and the measure you stated will be helpful, especially when trying to pass busy roads most importantly you need to people of your whereabouts, because people that were kidnapped hearing from them you will know that it is not a good experience at all so when we are on the street we should be careful.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on September 24, 2023, 06:40:59 AMI know say this thing dey very important but e no dey easy to do.¬† E dey hard to tell your people every of your waka o. As a young bobo, once once you must involve in illegal movements,¬† how u wan take tell your people say you wan enter Casablanca?Even as person wey don marry, you gat chill out sometimes make family stress no kill you.... base on that, how e go be to tell wifey say you dey enter some kind illegal place? Abi you wan scatter your family? Wetin I go advise be say, person suppose get one trusted person wey you go dey relate your illigal movements to wey no go cast you o. Then wifey and family members fit know the normal movements them. Na sense them take dey survive for this life,¬† meanwhile, my comment na for the guy men them... no be for our Deeper Life members o¬†   I enjoy how you take nack the nail on top the point even though I no like the name illegal sha. Person wey dey innocent or old school¬† fit translate am something else. But na the koko and matter be that. As we dey young so, na so we dey hunt for our freedom. Freedom of speech, freedom of expression, freedom of association and freedom of movement. As person dey mature na so him want make them allow am talk. Na so him wan contribute for every conversation whether e consine am or not. Him wan chuk mouth for any Mattias. But as person don dey grow old again, na so him go know say, there's power and wisdom in silence. When you don't talk necessarily, you save more words for the future use. And na so u go leave people inside incognita mode. E dey okay make life be like that. As for freedom of association and movement, as plenty of us dey mature na so we wan dey jump from one place to another con dey wan make plenty OGs at same time. We want make people dey hail us, make.dem sabi say we dey exist. Always trying to become relevant and get some validations or blueticks from people. But as you don dey grow, na so you go still realize say e no be anything. Na as we dey get that freedom of association, na so we dey pursue freedom of movement. Every place we wan go, we wan follow-follow and we wan dey waka, waka go different places, including places wey fit spoil our character (na that one be the illegal place wey u mention). We wan pull up with guys, we wan make dem hear us for street and na plenty reasons why youngsters dey quick-quick push themselves go early grave be that.Quote from: EluguHcman on September 24, 2023, 10:15:47 AMClearly at OP, ur family and trustees no fit save guard u where dem supposed harm u just by telling them ur whereabouts. Just as ur storyline, if the guys has told their parents (trustees) about their where to or whereabouts and they kidnapers hit them, how the family (trustees) want take give save guard response to that scenes?You talk am well, mate. Telling your family your whereabouts is not just enough. Being able to identify your boundaries as in places and periods to move around will be very helpful. Also make you try to understand the terrain wey u dey enter go really help a long way because most places wey these kind things they happen deybget signature (track records) unless on exceptional cases. So e good make we discipline ourselves well and monitor our movements as well as people around us (the passersby) and the environment at large. When you notice Surugege dance (suspicion), no body need tell you japa.Prayer na the roadblock to any evil and devil irrespective of how much them be or the number of attacks. No weapon that is fashioned against you shall prosper, and you shall confute every tongue that rises against you in judgment which also includes ill-fated attacks from enemies and frenemies. Person wey God don protect, man no fit harm am no matter how them gather. As a person you suppose get this mindset after you don exhaust all other precautionary measures because for this our country, not even the family and friends, dey secure again. And kidnappers no dey send numbers of target before them hit.To back up your prayers na to set up emergency numbers for your phone so you fit phone a friend or family when you're in danger. Also try make you know how to dial the 911 number so that you can reach out to the security deposits close to your vicinity. Some of them they work and dem fit rescue you sharply. No just underrated any options in the event it happens (God forbid) and learn how to shout and cry out loud when that could bring a solution to the situation.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AME get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. The matter no be small ooo as Dem suffer them , even threating to kill them for bush for their. Community people rally round to gather money pay this kidnapper to release them. Make I no cap too much, the major thing wey make me yarn this matter be say, this people wey Dem catch no even tell their relative say them dey go somewhere. Thank God say people see Dem as Dem dey go. Na that one make people raise alarm say, where this guy's. 3 guys enter one bike why the other one enter inh own separate bike because their mission different but these same direction. Na dis same spot Dem for catch them. Lesson¬† Always inform your piple about your movement if you trust them or find person wey you fit tell like wife or parent or pikin if u no trust any friend.¬†Always pass busy road, bush road wey be shotcut naim keep people for inside bush for seven days with beaten wey wrestlers self no collect for their life. Dey vigilant and make u no who be your friend This advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.¬†Wisdom Dem say, e dey profitable to direct person.E dey very important to relate our movement to our loved ones o we no say nobody wey no go die but make we use our head correctly. The way the world be now things dey happen well well and na most of those people wey we trust dey betray us so that is why there is need to inform people around you about your whereabouts as it will be easy to run investigation incase of any difficulties. No claim say you be big boy or big girl o, at least if you no value yourself e get people wey value and look up to you so no make them look confused because of your careless ness.Moreover, it is important to tell people around you about your activities as they might also guide you incase they sense danger. And again make we also be our brothers keeper as in we ought to know about the whereabouts of each other as this practice brings about love and unity among one another.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: A lot of things de happen for this country ooo and if i hear about kidnapping e no de surprise me like before again because for my place now kidnapping don even de turn normal thing, almost every month we de hear new cases of kidnap. Na only God fit save us for this country like this, people just fit go any length just for money na why every time we go just de hear different things wey de happen and e de fear me seriously like why do we have to hurt anyone just to make money. Why can‚Äôt everyone just work legally for money as it is supposed to be. We just have to be careful wherever we are and always be at alert, we should always be vigilant and just as op suggested we should always make sure a friend or relative is aware of our whereabouts and most importantly we should always pray for God‚Äôs protection.

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Quote from: Broadanbig on September 26, 2023, 07:55:46 PMOP this topic make sense o but make I tell you the truth, no be everybody wey like to dey tell person where dem dey go o. Some people own be say na don't tell anybody.¬† Anywhere dem dey go no concern you.But e no make sense,¬† if you wan commot at-least make u tell one person where u dey go incase if anything happens your family members go sabi where dey go find you go, the way insecurity they increase for dis country, e better make u they security conscious if u they waka and make u make sure say people sabi ur where about. I know say even to trust people with ur movement na problem now, but at least you suppose get like one person wey u go trust wey fit dey know where u dey go. As I dey school dey get one guy I sabi then, even if d guy dey go house for break, him no dey inform him parents say him dey come back house. How u go take dey travel and u no go inform anybody e no make sense now country no dey safe again.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: Quote from: Stable090 on September 29, 2023, 04:38:44 PMQuote from: Broadanbig on September 26, 2023, 07:55:46 PMOP this topic make sense o but make I tell you the truth, no be everybody wey like to dey tell person where dem dey go o. Some people own be say na don't tell anybody.¬† Anywhere dem dey go no concern you.But e no make sense,¬† if you wan commot at-least make u tell one person where u dey go incase if anything happens your family members go sabi where dey go find you go, the way insecurity they increase for dis country, e better make u they security conscious if u they waka and make u make sure say people sabi ur where about. I know say even to trust people with ur movement na problem now, but at least you suppose get like one person wey u go trust wey fit dey know where u dey go. As I dey school dey get one guy I sabi then, even if d guy dey go house for break, him no dey inform him parents say him dey come back house. How u go take dey travel and u no go inform anybody e no make sense now country no dey safe again. My brother u dey same page with me, after I make this post, kidnappers don con intensify their operation , as at yesterday evening another operation of kidnapper na ihm vigilante and police abort , Dem nearly move people inside forest , if no be the help of security men no be wetin we for dey talk now. If u still get parent, at least tell one of them ur movement, if you get wife or husband, try tell them, make we leave the issue of illegal Waka, no be when the country security dey hard now. If e happen finish, na Dem go still bear the pain and struggle for the person release. Shae you know say, sometimes Dem fit discourage you for some kind Waka wey u like Waka or Dem get information say dat road dey , dangerous.

comments.author: johnsaributua
comments.body: kidnapping with the mode of knowing the bitcoin balance in my opinion is quite extreme, or is bitcoin that popular there? That means assuming everyone has bitcoin and wherever they go they can take it anytime and anywhere?It's best if friendship is better not to know about finances and what is invested including social media because it can trigger someone to collect home information, names, cellphone numbers, activities from time to time and even signs of bitcoin ownership, can be from screenshots or status (threads) on social media that are shared.telling if possible to the home person before leaving for the destination and the road taken can be a solution and can use hidden cameras such as cctv on clothes, pants, rings etc. which may later be useful for searching or becoming evidence.This type of crime is quite high in other countries, although the motive is different but preventing and anticipating when it happens can make handling and searching faster. may we all be blessed friends.

comments.author: Timmzzy
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AME get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. Na dis same spot Dem for catch them. Lesson¬† Always inform your piple about your movement if you trust them or find person wey you fit tell like wife or parent or pikin if u no trust any friend.¬†Always pass busy road, bush road wey be shotcut naim keep people for inside bush for seven days with beaten wey wrestlers self no collect for their life. Dey vigilant and make u no who be your friend This advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.¬†Wisdom Dem say, e dey profitable to direct person.And all these things dey always happen when wey don dey middle of the year especially October, me like this i no fit commot wey my Girlfriend no go ask me and me i no fit keep my mouth shout if i wan drive out, even as she dey school she no dey with me na so she go dey call me to dey check on me if i don reach or i don come back, even one of my guy house wey him invite me over on to say the guy dey owe me money and small misunderstanding come follow dey inside the money matter so as this my gee invite me over i come tell my gf na so she dey panic, na so so call my gal give me even as i reach there come back. so definitely THIS THING YOU TALK IS A REAL DEAL ü§ù

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AME get one incident wey happen for my area last 3 weeks, wey 4 person for one quarter for my area enter kidnappers hand. The matter no be small ooo as Dem suffer them , even threating to kill them for bush for their. Community people rally round to gather money pay this kidnapper to release them. Make I no cap too much, the major thing wey make me yarn this matter be say, this people wey Dem catch no even tell their relative say them dey go somewhere. Thank God say people see Dem as Dem dey go. Na that one make people raise alarm say, where this guy's. 3 guys enter one bike why the other one enter inh own separate bike because their mission different but these same direction. Na dis same spot Dem for catch them. Lesson¬† Always inform your piple about your movement if you trust them or find person wey you fit tell like wife or parent or pikin if u no trust any friend.¬†Always pass busy road, bush road wey be shotcut naim keep people for inside bush for seven days with beaten wey wrestlers self no collect for their life. Dey vigilant and make u no who be your friend This advice good ooo, kidnappers no go enjoy your Bitcoin money leave you for hunger ooo. Shae una kno say, kidnappers dey work with information, so keep your Bitcoin investment from people wey you no trust make them no keep u for bush then collect your investment.¬†Wisdom Dem say, e dey profitable to direct person.This your matter need to be taking serious because no place safe this country now ooo. Last week a friend of mine call me tall is friend was missing, which dey know were him go and him no inform any body where him dey go and e tell me say e never ty wen they had contact and then said may God guide him home, as am speaking now he came back yesterday which I dey very happy to hear the good and I didn't bother to ask about wetin do am because so many things have to kept screat because well have ears.It very important to tell your people where you are go so that if dey wan find make e dey easy for them, also warn your family members to usually keep there were about screat, this happened to me which I lost my uncle that his neighbour make arrangements with the kidnappers am, to cut the story shout my escape from the hand of the kidnappers and my uncle try to inform his people about is where about and that how the neighbour try and inform the kidnappers and they wet there to kill him.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: E dey advisable for us to dey always tell our loved ones where we dey go because e get why. Dis world dey wicked and many bad things dey happen dis days. Armed rubbers fit waylay you for road, collect everything from your hand come leave you stranded, kidnappers fit obtain you, carry you go unknown location or bad friends fit do you evil too. Everyday evil for the country dey increase and na different different bad news we dey hear for radio and tv. So like dis na good thing to tell our family members of our movement, paraventure anything bad happen to us dem fit use the information take find us quickly.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on September 24, 2023, 06:20:45 AMDey vigilant and make u no who be your friend Na better advise be this. Some friends dey do illicit activities but the other friend no go no but na when casala burst then police con dey involved story go change but you wey dey answer friend go follow enter. Such situation dey worse if to say that friend don even give you some things wey him still hold and police con truly see am with you or you provide the thing, hmmm case go increase. That's why Dem say show me your friend and I go tell you who you be. We need dey vigilant true true
